description.value:
You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] while leaving a decoy behind.

The decoy acts as the spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mislead], though you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Invisible], just @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected]. You can continue to concentrate to move your decoy, as with the spell, whether or not you remain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] throughout the duration.

Once you use Perfect Distraction, you need to spend 10 minutes to set up another decoy before you can use it again.
